Text:
I read the reports, but I can't believe you're
actually alive...!
I can't rest in peace until I bury you.

If the letter sent in Lady Karen von Herzog's name
contained evidence proving the massacre...

You would have no choice but to verify its
authenticity, regardless of where it came from.

Whether or not the connection with the Cult of
Diablos is made public, if the world learns you
plotted against the Herzog family...

Your name as one of Velgalta's Seven Blades will be
tarnished and even the Cult of Diablos will abandon
you.

And so, you had no choice but to accept our
invitation and show up here.
Your fate as a knight of Velgalta is sealed.

The empire will judge you for the crime of
slaughtering the Herzog family, and you will
lose everything as a knight.

...So you're saying you're giving me the chance to
be killed here before that happens?

Is that why you went through all the trouble to lure
me here?! Such arrogance, Lady Karen!

Heh... From the tip of my spear, I can sense your
barely concealed confusion.

You're wondering how my possession is completely
cured and why I chose to meet in this place.

Your confusion at what you're witnessing is
palpable—
Aagh?!
Wh-Where did that come from... Ugfff...!
*gasp* A magic slash?!
Lord Sergey! We're surrounded!
So, you're...
...the Shadow Garden.
We lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows...

Don't underestimate their strength based on their
appearances! Watch out for slime attacks from
underground!

Judging by his immediate response...we're up against
a formidable foe!
But... Heheh.
Gyaaahhh!!!
Gwaaarghhh!!!
Tsk... Fools... I warned you to stay vigilant!

Well, with the strength of an average soldier,
I guess avoiding our attacks isn't easy.
...In that case!
Hyaaaaahhhh!!!

Did he just gouge out a huge chunk of the
ground...?!

I see. Clever. Or should I say devious.
He's uprooted the slime traps themselves.

We can't afford to lose slime at this rate...
We'll have to move quickly...!
Aah! Lord Sergey! The slime...is surrounding us!

Don't mindlessly approach them! Their plan is to
intercept us!

You think you've cornered us by surrounding the
battlefield—saves us the trouble of going to you!

After all, you've just trapped yourselves in a cage!
Now you can't escape my sword!
Let's see how long that confidence lasts.
I! Will! Hunt you down!

Sergey the Storm Sword, First Child of Diablos...the
blades of the Shadow Garden will be your end!
Not a chance! The ones to die...will be you lot!
